thread.title: Thousands of plastic eggs wash ashore on Germany's Langeoog Island
thread.title_full: Thousands of plastic eggs wash ashore on Germany's Langeoog Island

author: Charlotte Krol
title: Thousands of plastic eggs wash ashore on Germany's Langeoog Island
text:
Thousands of plastic eggs wash ashore on Germany's Langeoog Island Watch | Thousands of plastic eggs wash ashore on Germany's Langeoog Island 00:36 Charlotte Krol , and AP, video source DNF 7 January 2017 â€¢ 2:32pm 
E aster has come early to the German North Sea island of Langeoog. 
A flood of plastic eggs containing tiny toys has been swept ashore after a fierce storm, to the delight of the island's youngest residents. The brightly-coloured plastic eggs contain instructions in the Cyrillic alphabet Credit: DNF 
T he eggs containing instructions in the Cyrillic alphabet appear to have come from a container lost by a cargo ship en route for the German port of Bremerhaven. 
Local broadcasters reported on Thursday that island authorities have called in a local nursery to help collect the unexpected bounty before it becomes a hazard for wildlife. Watch | Mexicans line up for 4,724-metre long cake 00:49
